item.giftwrap.name: Gift Wrap
item.giftwrap.description: It's a roll of pretty gift wrap for hiding presents.
item.wrappedgift.name: Wrapped Gift
message.giftopened: {{Recipient}} just opened a gift from {{Sender}}! It was {{OneOrMany}} {{ItemName}}.
menu.infopanel.body:
Place an item in the box to wrap it up!

Leave it under another player's Winter Star tree to give them something nice to wake up to. Wrapped gifts are better for making friends in town, too!
config.invertmousebuttons.name: Invert Mouse Button Actions
config.invertmousebuttons.description:
By default, the 'use tool' button picks-up and puts-down gifts and gift wrap,
and the 'action' button interacts opens the gift wrapping menu and unwraps placed gifts.
Enabling this option will flip the two actions.
